school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
comments: Textbook for the class is a MUST. Book Notes is a MUST. You learn a lot but she expects a lot with her studnets

school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
comments: She was great. Book is a must,taking notes is a must. 2 museum papers: easy.

school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
comments: WHAT? i must have caught her at a bad point in her life... bcuz i cant stand her! she is like bipolar and rude... she knows what shes talking abt but she has the worst attitude ever she is never on time and she gets upset if we are not passionate about art! sry if we actually have a life i dreaded going to this class i swear this lady is crazy

school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
comments: Good Professor, funny, gets the job done. I thinks she expects a little too much of the students.But overall she gets through to you and I think shes a good professor, I just get annoyed how shes late with grades for example today is the last day to submit final grades and hers still arent up!

school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
comments: The class is not hard! All she asks is to take notes on whatever she assigns you. She doesn\'t check it, but it helps when you have info to share with her and the class. There are no quizzes/tests, just two museum reports. She tells you exactly what she wants from you on those reports. BTW, Final is sort of hard!

school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
comments: she is a good teacher, who expects you to be present 100% of the time while she is in like 60% o the time. she is very hard on her grading and you have to have no kids, of other responsibilities if you take her. overall she seems cool, but dont let that fool you!

school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
comments: If you\'re taking Art History, you want to take her. She\'s a great professor, clear about the subject and what she expects from the class. Her class is well structured, so don\'t miss any of the reading assigments. Professor Suchma is also very helpful; she\'s funny too. Her enthusiasm will keep you on your toes. Must take at JJay.
